effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.
